list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cook (food) by dry heat without direct exposure to a flame, typically in an oven or on a hot surface.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they bake their own bread and cakes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ nướng bánh mì và bánh ngọt của riêng họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of the sun or other agency) subject (something) to dry heat, especially so as to harden it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the sun has baked the earth a dusty brown
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mặt trời đã nướng trái đất một màu nâu bụi bặm
